title.narrative: Sexual and Reproductive Health for all Initiative (SARAI)

description.narrative: (Zambia): The Sexual and Reproductive Health for All Initiative (SARAI) project is supporting the Government of the Republic of Zambia to reposition family planning services through the scale-up of high-impact interventions that increase access to and quality of family planning services. FY 2018 funds will support interventions in 17 districts, including: policy strengthening and support; capacity building of provincial, district, and health facility managers and health care providers through training and mentorship; systems strengthening through procurement of basic equipment and improved supply chain management; behavior change communication activities including community sensitization and engagement of community networks; expansion of the contraceptive mix at community level by engaging community based distributors to provide oral and injectable contraceptives as well as condoms; and systems strengthening for human resources for health through engagement of the "off-duty" providers. These activities contribute to USAID's goal of preventing maternal deaths.. .
